extendedInfo.description: Look out below, these birds need to POOP!Birds of a feather drop turds together in this high-flying, tap to crap hunt for targets to poop on.  Flock to beaches, construction sites and city parks to take aim on unsuspecting lifeguards, grannies and Facebook friends below!  Watch out for helicopters, UFOâs and toxic waste as you soar through the rapid-fire skies.  Snag power-upâs, scoop-up mystery boxes and collect as many coins as you can before running out of gas! - Watch what you eat along the way because not all poop is as pretty as a rainbow!- Connect to Facebook and your friendâs profile pictures become targets! - Collect feathers on your journey and unlock new birds like Sergeant Squirts and The Deuce.Already a fan of the game or just like poop? Like us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/turdbirds

reviews.title: SMOOTH
reviews.comment: Nice game. Easy play. Quick loading. Well done.
reviews.author: Brett Beckmann

reviews.title: Would be nice to play it
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t load on my android tablet at all.ironicall all I get is a screen full of bird crap which is exactly my thoughts on this (cr)app. Sort it out!!!
reviews.author: Lisa Chivers

reviews.title: Above average
reviews.comment: I love the concept and game itself, however, it takes a lot to get new birds and hard as heck to get gems been playing three days still haven\'t had one.
reviews.author: Melinda Coulter

reviews.comment: I really hate the pop up ads asking me to rate this, so thatisthe only reason my opinion is up here...
reviews.author: Mikayla Smith

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Really lots of fun. There is sardonic pleasure in virtually pooping on someone. Lol  Must download and definitely a keeper. Enjoy
reviews.author: Tanvi Parekh

reviews.title: Turd Birds
reviews.comment: Funny game... my son laughs everytime I poop on the kids!
reviews.author: Desiree Manley

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Wish you didn\'t have to keep starting over....
reviews.author: Amanda Blake

reviews.title: Fun game but has some issues
reviews.comment: The game runs great in my older LG G2X until I get to around the 5th? section of the game and helicopters start firing missiles at you, at that point the game becomes unplayable, lagging and skipping constantly. I\'d love to keep playing but this artifical barrier stops me from playing more.
reviews.author: Zac Donald

reviews.title: Good game!!
reviews.comment: Pretty cool game! Only thing is that u cant start where u left off!
reviews.author: Derrell Spellers

reviews.title: Entertaining and fun what more could a person ?
reviews.comment: Enjoyable, entertaining, and fun
reviews.author: Phil Cochran

reviews.title: So much fun.
reviews.comment: This is great after a long day working with people. I think we all wish we could see someone get splattered.
reviews.author: Leticia Zayas

reviews.title: I just got this game and I am alredy loving it
reviews.comment: It a wonder game.
reviews.author: miguel delgado

reviews.title: I am ashamed to admit that I like this immature game.
reviews.comment: This game is similar to, but not quite the same as infinite runners such as Subway Surfers. You do not go around collecting coins\342\200\224 you poop on people and things below. In addition to the immature joy that this provides, the game also has some beautiful environments, and \342\200\224 unlike other infinite runners \342\200\224 a sense of progress as you go further, thanks to the changing environments and map screen. You can also unlock other birds with different abilities. Overall, this is a high-quality toilet-humour-filled game.
reviews.author: Alex Bolgarov

reviews.title: Turdliscious!
reviews.comment: Running through coins has become incredibly boring. Pooping on people? Now that\'s entertaining. You can s**t on grannies, kids, construction workers, and lots of other innocent folks all while dodging UFOs and tentacles, and eating donuts. I\'m down.
reviews.author: Ashley Doom

reviews.title: funny
reviews.comment: makes you laugh and kills time,just a little laggy
reviews.author: elliott leon

reviews.title: Great idea
reviews.comment: Fun to play.. There is a room for little improvement in smoothness wise.. I have sony xperia L so i think it is powerful enough to remove any lag
reviews.author: Shaheer Khan

reviews.title: Exellent
reviews.comment: It\'s an amazing fun game I really enjoyed playing it .  install it you\'ll get what I mean by amazing.
reviews.author: ne mo

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Nice game for tympass yahooo
reviews.author: Sayantan Guha Roy

reviews.title: Fun and addictive
reviews.comment: Tons of stuff to do too
reviews.author: Yaseen Sabra

reviews.title: This game is just awesome
reviews.comment: I love it because of the different  birds and the pooping part
reviews.author: Melany Warfuel
